0.12.name: wordpress/pixelpostrss
0.12.description: You are using Wordpress and PixelPost. You are probably interrested in showing your latest photos on your blog. pixelpostRSS display thumbnail from your Pixelpost photoblog. Click on the thumbnail and you open the full size photo.
